text: Hagi Aisaia'ma mani'nere vute'za Hezekaia'ma hu'nea nanekea amanage hu'za ome asami'naze, Asiria vahe'mo'za tazeri haviza hu naneke hazageno tagrira tusi tagaze higeta tusi'a knafi mani'none. Ana hunkeno mago a'mo mofavre ante kna'amo erava'o hu'neanagi, hankave'a omnegeno mofavrea ame huno'ma onteaza huno, tagrira hankavetia omne'ne.
